# Bloody Bite (Ex)
## Overview
*Bloody Bite (Ex):* The barbarianâ€™s bite attack deals 1d6 points of bleed damage in addition to its other effects. The barbarian must have the [[Animal Fury (Ex)|animal fury]] rage power or a natural bite attack before selecting this power.

**Source:** Agents of Evil, pg. 25
